metadata.title: CVE-2022-3637 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability has been found in Linux Kernel and classified asproblematic. This vulnerability affects the function jlink_init of the filemonitor/jlink.c of the component BlueZ. The manipulation leads to denial ofservice. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. Theidentifier of this vulnerability is VDB-211936.

criterions.comment: bluez: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
